mapper.select: select (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, u.user_id, cart_id, p.prod_code, prod_title_image, prod_url, p.prod_title, c.order_cnt, p.prod_point, prod_point*order_cnt as total_point, p.prod_price, prod_price_sale*order_cnt as total_price from product p , user_member u , cart c where c.user_id = u.user_id and c.prod_code = p.prod_code and u.user_id = #{user_id} order by prod_code;
